mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_type, user_no, board_title, board_content) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{userNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_type = #{boardType}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, update_date = NOW() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM board WHERE 1=1
AND board_type = #{cond.boardType}
AND (board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%') OR board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY board_reg_date DESC
